title: Bard Visual Bug: Snow Day health shrine has vanilla base
body: When you place a health shrine as Snow Day Bard in this current patch (8.6), it uses the vanilla Bard "pedestal" visual instead of the teacup saucer.

replies.body: Thanks for the report, Bodhwell! This is also similarly occurring with Elderwood Bard. ;-; It was a side effect of some back side file shuffling. We're looking into this today. :)
I was just about to update with Elderwood. :) Thanks for looking into it so quickly and letting us know about it!
You're welcome! Thanks for taking the time to write a bug report! :3
